text: The Nehru Stadium before a Kerala Blasters match in 2014. Kerala Blasters is an Indian professional football club based in Kochi ,Kerala. The club participates in the Indian Super League since its inception. The club was established on 24 May 2014 and began their first professional season a few months later in October 2014. They play their home matches at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium. ==Indian Super League== As of 30 May 2020 Note: The following table contains the results of Kerala Blasters Football Club against all the clubs participating in the Indian Super League {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
